summary: I appreciate all the nott and caleb quotes of the past that are being pulled back to be fully revealed as the emotional stab...
body:
I appreciate all the nott and caleb quotes of the past that are being pulled back to be fully revealed as the emotional stab wounds they are, but i think i’ve only seen this one included in only one video

  • “yeza was his name, the halfling man from before… that’s all. i just wanted to say his name out loud. it’s been a while.”

this is the most torturous one to me. this is how alone and scared and resigned she’s been. it’s been over a year since she’s said her husband’s name. GODS KILL ME NOW.

reblog.comment:

this is the most torturous one to me. this is how alone and scared and resigned she’s been. it’s been over a year since she’s said her husband’s name. GODS KILL ME NOW.

summary: Me, more than a decade ago, reading Artemis Fowl: Wow this Irish genius is basically an adult, why is everyone trying to stop...
body:
Me, more than a decade ago, reading Artemis Fowl: Wow this Irish genius is basically an adult, why is everyone trying to stop him from Doing Things? 

Me, realizing that Keyleth from Critical Role is only 22 for most of the campaign: who put antlers on this toddler and thought it was okay to let her leave the house

summary: Travis: *hums obnoxiously to express his boredom while Brian and Taliesin discuss poetry* Brian & Tal: *completely ignore him...
body:
Travis: *hums obnoxiously to express his boredom while Brian and Taliesin discuss poetry*

Brian & Tal: *completely ignore him and just keep going*

Travis: *gives up on subtlety and actively makes fun of poetry*

Taliesin: *tells Travis with complete sincerity that he would love this one poet* *promises to introduce Travis to his work*  *returns to the discussion*

ETA: I just realized that Travis is using the Kiri plushie’s dagger to stab himself in the neck repeatedly, and I am dying.

tags: i just want them all in crazy outfits with ridiculous looking weapons
bouncing all over the place and shooting each other
summary: listen i know nothing at all about overwatch but i kinda of want a critical role overwatch mashup where it’s just vox machina,...
body:
listen i know nothing at all about overwatch but i kinda of want a critical role overwatch mashup where it’s just vox machina, the mighty nein, and unlockable guest pcs all with ridiculous costumes and super powerful ultimate moves

arenas could include all the different planes and cities, maybe some temples, sewers, a ship, underwater???

and of course they all have special character interactions with each other like vex going “sorry, darling” if she attacks percy or scanlan’s ultimate move being accompanied by him shouting “you leave when burt reynolds tells you to leave!”

vox machina’s ultimate moves have to do with their vestiges, or, for tary, it’s “doty, do something!”. molly’s ultimate move is accompanied by “i am your god, long may i reign!” 

i don’t know how or why this would exist but i want it

summary: Vox machina and Mighty nein Spoilers
body:
Vox machina and Mighty nein Spoilers

I just got to the part in CR1E24 where Percy talks about the murder of his family and the torture he endured when Grog says do you want me to kill him (or something to that affect). It reminded me of Fjord saying that to Nott when she told them about her murder and torture. So my conclusion is that Travis loves his friends so much that even in RPGs, NO ONE hurts his friends.

reblog.comment:

summary: I don’t have Alpha, and I’ve never watched an After Dark segment of Talks Machina in my life, and now I’m just marathoning the...
body:
I don’t have Alpha, and I’ve never watched an After Dark segment of Talks Machina in my life, and now I’m just marathoning the playlist on YouTube, and I get to see Brian and Taliesin bond over poetry, and this is so adorable, my life is blessed.

Also, I got a job offer.

reblog.comment:
I don’t have Alpha, and I’ve never watched an After Dark segment of Talks Machina in my life, and now I’m just marathoning the playlist on YouTube, and I get to see Brian and Taliesin bond over poetry, and this is so adorable, my life is blessed.

Also, I got a job offer.

trail.content_raw:
I don’t have Alpha, and I’ve never watched an After Dark segment of Talks Machina in my life, and now I’m just marathoning the playlist on YouTube, and I get to see Brian and Taliesin bond over poetry, and this is so adorable, my life is blessed.

Also, I got a job offer.
trail.content:
I don’t have Alpha, and I’ve never watched an After Dark segment of Talks Machina in my life, and now I’m just marathoning the playlist on YouTube, and I get to see Brian and Taliesin bond over poetry, and this is so adorable, my life is blessed.

Also, I got a job offer.
